case.name: Legge v Mackinlays Solicitors (No 2) [2008] FCA 513 (10 April 2008)

citphrases.citphrase: whether adjournment sine die to be granted.

citances.sentence: In Legge v Mackinlay Solicitors No 2 , [2] delivered on 10 April 2008, the Federal Court ordered that Mr Simonsen's notice of motion be dismissed. The position is, therefore, that Mr Legge's bankruptcy has been annulled. There is no bankruptcy in which to prove a debt as is sought in the application.
